tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are married for 4 years, since from my first year of marriage, we always dream to have a baby but unfortunately my wife went into multiple abortions and we never come to know what was the exact reason. Recently my wife blessed with the pregnancy and now she is entering into 5th month. With god’s grace we were able to find Dr.Neeraja madam, she is treating from the first month, so far my wife and baby are doing very well. I am super excited to see my baby. I can’t thank enough Neeraja Madam’s help, really lucky to find such a friendly and good hearted doctor.
reply_text: Tq so much for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ********* ******* Very friendly. I visited her for my wife Smt. Vasuki's treatment. She was in no hurry to dispose us off. Instead, heard our problem very patiently and suggested some diagnostic procedures so that she can arrive at the exact diagnosis of the problem and suggest us the right kind of treatment. After seeing the reports, she suggested Laparoscopic surgery, for which we agreed readily and she performed the surgery within a week. Now, my wife is recovering very fast and thank God she is relieved of all the trauma & menopausal problems she had faced for the last 2 years. We are very much thankful to Dr. Neeraja Valli garu for all this. I strongly recommend Dr. Neeraja Valli garu.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I Mrs.Habeebunnisa 
Admitted in PRK hospital in chandanagar 
In serious condition with low Blood pressure(60/40) & less hemoglobin (3.9 ).
Dr. Neeraja Valli  Gynaecologist
she is my doctor with good experience & friendly in nature  with patient & good counsellor
 I have been underwent RUPTURED  ECTOPIC  surgery  ......I am now in good health ... because of Neeraja ma'am & Nurses 
Off course god is first to save our life 
Next is doctor Neeraja ma'am .

Hope to see in good treatment in the future also 


Thank u 

Dr.Neeraja valli
reply_text: Tq for your kind words. Take care, get well soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We got married in 2014 since then we have been trying to conceive and visited multiple doctors and hospitals but the results are not fruitful.

We have approached Dr Neeraja fertility & gynaec in 2021 Feb where the step to turn our hope to happiness had started. And the journey with  Dr Neeraja Fertility & Gunaec was extremely appreciable with best treatment, well experienced staff, Good hospitality and more than this Guidance and support of Doctor Neeraja Valli.We have got our IVF in Oct 2021 which went successful and made our dream of 7 yrs come true.

The procedure and dr Neeraja mam's guidance on each and every step on this treatment is really appreciable. We highly recommend Dr Neeraja fertility & Gynaec Centre for who does not have children with out second opinion. The treatment and procedure also get in time without any delay.

Thank you doctor for creating miracle in our lives.

Finally the best place to achieve to your child dreams.

Thank you ones again Dr.Neeraja Valli mam and staff.
reply_text: Tq so so much for taking time to elaborate in detail about our center and my team
